item.title: CVE-2023-49172|2024-08-02T21:53:43.284Z -- braincert -- braincert%20%E2%80%93%20html5%20virtual%20classroom
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BrainCert BrainCert – HTML5 Virtual Classroom allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects BrainCert – HTML5 Virtual Classroom: from n/a through 1.30.
